email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 160,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight offer is USD 18.50 per metric ton. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 18.00? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can offer USD 18.20 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

USD 18.20 is acceptable. However, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 October to better align with our loading schedule?

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

We can adjust the laycan to 17-22 October as requested. Please confirm the final terms so I can prepare the summary.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Confirmed. Please send over the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 160,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 17-22 October
- Freight: USD 18.20 per metric ton
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez
